Package pkgView

Class PlantView

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.image.ImageView
pkgView.PlantView
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class PlantView
extends javafx.scene.image.ImageView
Author:
Ryan Dean View class for plant objects. Used by Edit Garden screen to click and drag plants onto garden.
